text: Anata gata shinko suru mono yo, arra ni shitagai nasai, mata shito to anata gata no naka no ken'no o motsu mono ni shitagae. Anata gata wa nanigoto ni tsuite mo iron ga areba, arra to shumatsu no hi o shinjiru nonara, kore o arra to shito ni yudane nasai. Sore wa mottomo yoi, mottomo datona ketteidearu
